translations: v．免除责任，宣告无罪：证明某人无罪或免除某人的责任。
· The court exonerates him from all charges.
法庭宣告他无罪，免除所有指控。

sentences.sentence: The report on the accident exonerates the company from any responsibility.
sentences.translation: 事故的报告认为公司是没有任何责任的。

sentences.sentence: The report on the accident exonerates the bus driver from any responsibility.
sentences.translation: 事故的报告认为公共汽车司机是没有任何责任的。
